name: [VERY Incomplete/Unstable] Beat The Clock
description:
Little chaser game where you're suppose to enter a tiny zone and press spacebar once you're done.

It's hard to explain to be honest good luck figuring it out *head scratch*

Just.. go right SLOWLY until you see green! Then press spacebar when you've stopped moving and in green zone.

CONTROLS: WASD/Up down left right to MOVE

Spacebar for "action".
